params._bounty: - the nonce of the bounty being added to the user's inventory
params._user: - the address being given an bounty
params._value: - the number of orgtokens to award the user

params._item: - the nonce of the item being added to the user's inventory
params._user: - the address being given an item
params._value: - the number of orgtokens to debit the user

params._user: - the address being queried for orgtoken balance

returns._balance: - the number of orgtokens owned by the account

enroll(string,string,string).details: should only be called if unenrolled!future state could digest a signature from an admin to approve them more securely

params._imageUrl: - the user's google profile image URL

returns._nonce: - the nonce of the user within the contract

params._user: - the address being queried as a user

returns._bounties: - array of all bounties earned by the user
returns._items: - array of nonces of all items purchased by the user

params._user: - the address being queried for name

returns._name: - the name text of the user

params._user: - the address being promoted to administrator
- the address being queried for user role

returns._role: - uint code for their role       0 = none; 1 = member, 2 = administrator

params._at: - the address of the bounty contract
- the address of the item contract

params._twitterId: - the truncated twitter id of the user (ex: mubcblockchain)

addBounty(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add a new bounty to the user's inventory

addItem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add a new item to the user's inventory

getUser(address).notice: Return all user data for a given address if enrolled

getUsers().notice: Return critical user data for all enrolled

name(address).notice: Get the name of a given user
